item.title: The Mindset When Climbing the Mountain
item.description: A surprisingly relevant image. (ty James for finding this <3) Climbing Mount Kilimanjaro is no easy feat. Seriously. I’ve no doubt that unless you’re some type of mountain sherpa, you’d agree with me on that one. However, I’d like to paint a slightly different perspective, with references, of course. The Kilimanjaro climb consists of 2 main parts: the trail, and the high camp. The time on the trail, including lunch and rest breaks, averages around six hours per day.
